Text: Senator Jimmy Harte highlighted the case of one family who are being paid €1,763 per week. The unemployed married couple, who have four children and live in Dublin, claim a range of social welfare benefits.
Cause: The unemployed married couple, who have four children and live in Dublin, claim a range of social welfare benefits.
Effect: Senator Jimmy Harte highlighted the case of one family who are being paid €1,763 per week.
